statements: SELECT * FROM course_fees
SELECT student_id, course_name, fee_amount FROM course_fees WHERE student_id = 100
SELECT course_name, fee_amount, payment_date FROM course_fees ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT student_id, course_name, payment_method FROM course_fees WHERE payment_method IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM course_fees
SELECT * FROM course_fees WHERE student_id = 2345 ORDER BY payment_date DESC, fee_amount ASC;
SELECT course_name, fee_amount FROM course_fees WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY fee_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(fee_amount) AS average_fee FROM course_fees WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT course_name) AS num_courses FROM course_fees GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_courses > 1;
SELECT course_name, SUM(fee_amount) AS total_fees FROM course_fees GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY total_fees DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM course_fees;
SELECT course_name, fee_amount FROM course_fees WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT course_name, fee_amount FROM course_fees WHERE fee_amount > 500;
SELECT course_name, fee_amount FROM course_fees ORDER BY fee_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_date, amount_paid, payment_method FROM payment_details;
SELECT course_id, course_name, fee_amount, payment_status FROM course_fees WHERE fee_amount > 1000 ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_fees WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(payment_id) AS num_payments FROM course_fees JOIN payment_details ON course_fees.course_id = payment_details.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING num_payments > 5;
SELECT course_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payment_details WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(fee_amount), MAX(amount_paid), MIN(amount_paid) FROM course_fees JOIN payment_details ON course_fees.course_id = payment_details.course_id WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM billing_details;
SELECT course_id, billing_date, amount FROM billing_details WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, course_fee FROM course_details ORDER BY course_fee DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_fee FROM course_details WHERE course_fee > 100;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_amount < 500;
SELECT billing_id, course_id, amount, billing_date, payment_status FROM billing_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_fee FROM course_details WHERE course_fee < 500 ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT billing_id, course_id, billing_date FROM billing_details WHERE payment_status = true AND amount >= 5000 ORDER BY billing_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, billing_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_details WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY billing_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, payment_date, amount_paid FROM students JOIN payments ON students.student_id = payments.student_id;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_fee > 1000 ORDER BY course_fee DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, transaction_date FROM students JOIN transactions ON students.student_id = transactions.student_id ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM students ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, amount_paid, payment_date FROM students JOIN payments ON students.student_id = payments.student_id WHERE amount_paid > 1000;
SELECT course_name, SUM(course_fee) AS total_fee FROM courses GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_fee > 5000;
SELECT student_name, transaction_date, amount, transaction_type FROM students JOIN transactions ON students.student_id = transactions.student_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Expense';

SELECT student_name, course_name, payment_date, amount_paid FROM students JOIN payments ON students.student_id = payments.student_id JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM course_fees;
SELECT course_name, fee_amount FROM course_fees;
SELECT student_id, student_name, payment_method FROM students;
SELECT payment_date, amount_paid FROM payments;
SELECT description, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM course_fees WHERE fee_amount > 5000
SELECT student_name, course_name, amount_paid FROM students INNER JOIN payments ON students.student_id = payments.student_id
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT course_name, fee_amount, payment_date FROM course_fees JOIN payments ON course_fees.course_id = payments.course_id
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount_paid BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
